short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organise your favourite images on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This handy extension allows you to save, organise and browse interesting and inspirational images you find on the web to the cloud. Simply install the extension, right click on an image and click "Save to Pictobox". Keep your images secure and accessible from any device.
